sailpoint.object

Class RoleRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.Assignment
        • sailpoint.object.RoleAssignment
          • sailpoint.object.RoleRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject

    public class RoleRequest
extends RoleAssignment
    Used to record information about a permitted role request in an Identity. This has all of the same information as RoleAssignment, and adds some context around the request and is stored in a different preferences attribute.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
